entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove support for self-contained output during `dotnet build` #37780
  • [NETSDKE2E] CoreFX symbols are missing while debugging IL Symbols on MacOS #37762

Closed

  • PublishTrimmed should imply self-contained #30104

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Compute SdkAnalysisProperty at the beginning of the SDK Targets #37778
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix sln add for duplicate projects under different paths with same root #37542
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #37368
    Area-External, Servicing-approved, 8.0.2

Updated

  • Add comment #37753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
